title: Image-Line FL Studio 12 0 2 Signature Bundle-r4e
description:
Image-Line.FL.Studio.12.0.2.Signature.Bundle-r4e


FL Studio is one of the world's most popular and exciting

music production systems. Everything you need in one package

to compose, arrange, record, edit, mix and master professional

quality music. 

FL Studio 12 totally reworks the user interface and adds

exciting new features you have been asking for.



New & Updated Features: 

Fully reworked interface - Any screen size or resolution

you use, FL12 will always fit

Multi-touch - Multi-touch capability extends

to the Mixer.

Browser - New category tabs and the

ability to delete content

on right-click

Channel Menu - The Channel Options Menu have

moved from the Toolbar Menus

to the Channel rack.

Channel settings - Have been integrated into the

Plugin Wrapper (no more Channel

settings pop-up).

Pattern Menu - The Pattern Menu has moved from

the Channel rack to the Toolbar

Menu and Pattern Selector.

Piano roll - Piano roll Auto-zoom can now be

deselected from Settings >

General > Auto zoom in piano roll

Playlist - Multiple drag and drop for audio

files onto Playlist (from a

Windows file browser).

Stepsequencer - Step sequences are now inter-

changeable with Piano rolls.

VST Plugins - VST plugin installation &

discovery improved and

simplified.

Fruity Formula Controller - Updated, new UI.

Fruity Envelope Controller - Updated, 8 Articulators,

Mod X/Y env, Smart Knobs,

New UI. 

Fruity Keyboard Controller - Attack smoothing, new UI.


Supplier : r4e 

Packager : r4e 

Cracker : r4e 

Protection : Keyfile/AES 

Date : May 14th 2015

Language : English 

Platform : Windows x64/x86 

iNSTALL NOTES


1. run the Setup (as Admin on Win Vista, 7, 8, 8.1 & 10)

2. choose the options you want to use & install

3. enjoy! 



ADDiTiONAL

- If you owned a legal copy of FL Studio 12 using your

bought FLRegKey, this crack/installer won't affect your key

or registration name. It just activates all features of the

Signature Bundle and all included Instruments & Effects.

- In case you've installed my Dark-Blue Icons & Splash and want

to reset these later (make sure to select 'Backup original files'

in the installer), go to the installation path of FL Studio 12

and take a look inside of the dir 'r4e'.

...And always remember:

If you like the software, buy it as I did!

nfo by r4e 2015
